name: CERN Online Demonstration Austria
author: Ralf "Arby" Brostedt

sections.description:
Austrias government is planing to cancel its CERN-membership. This plugin adds a clickable image to support the online petition http://sos.teilchen.at/petition

The online demonstration wiki can be found at http://wiki.die-truppe.com/Online-Demo
sections.installation:
1. Upload cern-online-demonstration-austria.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq: This plugin is based on VDS Page Peel, which was originally developed by Ralf “Arby” Brostedt

short_description: Austrias government is planing to cancel its CERN-membership. This plugin adds a clickable image to support the online petition http://sos.teilchen.
